ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:30}); // {Cloud}
“If Spirit Energy disappears,
our Planet will die.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:32}); // {Cloud}
“You're talking about Mako energy, right?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:8}); // {Tifa}
“Look, look! A shooting star!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:11}); // {Yuffie}
“Wh, what the? A shooting star?”
fade({r:255, g:255, b:255, speed:200, type:6, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:200, type:5, adjust:255});
fade({r:255, g:255, b:255, speed:200, type:6, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:200, type:5, adjust:255});
fade({r:255, g:255, b:255, speed:200, type:6, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:200, type:5, adjust:255});
fade({r:255, g:255, b:255, speed:250, type:6, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:250, type:5, adjust:255});
fade({r:255, g:255, b:255, speed:250, type:6, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:250, type:5, adjust:255});
fade({r:255, g:255, b:255, speed:250, type:6, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:250, type:5, adjust:255});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:12, type:2, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:1, type:4, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:6, type:1, adjust:255});

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:29}); // Bugenhagen
“…These are the basics
of the Study of Planet Life.”

ops.raw: a5 00 00 04 fd ad fb 00 f9 b2 01

ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:17}); // Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho Hoooo. Yes, it is something,
isn't it?”{PAUSE}“Well, let's get to
the subject.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:18}); // Bugenhagen
“Eventually…all humans die.
What happens to them after they die?”{PAUSE}“The body decomposes, and returns to
the Planet. That much everyone knows.
What about their consciousness,
their hearts and their souls?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:19}); // Bugenhagen
“The soul too returns
to the Planet.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:20}); // “And not only those of humans, but everything
on this Planet. In fact, all living things
in the universe, are the same.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:21}); // “The spirits that return to the Planet,
merge with one another and roam the Planet.”{PAUSE}“They roam, converge, and divide,
becoming a swell, called the 'Lifestream'.”{PAUSE}“Lifestream…
In other words, a path of
energy of the souls roaming the Planet.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:22}); // “'Spirit Energy' is a word that
you should never forget.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:23}); // “A new life…children are
blessed with Spirit Energy and
are brought into the world.”{PAUSE}“Then, the time comes when they die
and once again return to the Planet…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:24}); // “Of course there are exceptions,
but this is the way of the world.”{PAUSE}“I've digressed, but you'll
understand better if you watch this.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:31}); // Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho Hoooo.
Spirit Energy is efficient BECAUSE it exists
within nature.”{PAUSE}“When Spirit Energy is forcefully extracted,
and manufactured, it can't accomplish
its true purpose.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:33}); // Bugenhagen
“Everyday Mako reactors suck up
Spirit Energy, diminishing it.”{PAUSE}“Spirit Energy is compressed in reactors
and processed into Mako energy. All living
things are being used up and thrown away.”{PAUSE}“In other words, Mako energy
will only destroy the Planet…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:1}); // {Aeris}
“So pretty…It's just like
the real thing!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:2}); // {Tifa}
“Wow! It's just like the real thing!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:5}); // {Yuffie}
“Woa! Wooooah!
Pretty good, surprisin' me!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:6}); // Bugenhagen
“Hmm, yes pretty good.
This is my laboratory.”{PAUSE}“All the workings of space
are entered into this
3D Holographic System.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:18}); // Bugenhagen
“Eventually…all humans die.
What happens to them after they die?”{PAUSE}“The body decomposes, and returns to
the Planet. That much everyone knows.
What about their consciousness,
their hearts and their souls?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:25}); // Spirit energy is the source of life for
trees, birds, and humans.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:26}); // And not only living things.
It makes it possible
to form Planets.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:27}); // And if that Spirit Energy
were to disappear…
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:28}); // “It would be the end of life as we know it.”

dialogStrings: Observatory

{Aeris}
“So pretty…It's just like
the real thing!”

{Tifa}
“Wow! It's just like the real thing!”

{Barret}
“This is really somethin'!”

{Cait Sith}
“Whew!
Just like the real thing!”

{Yuffie}
“Woa! Wooooah!
Pretty good, surprisin' me!”

Bugenhagen
“Hmm, yes pretty good.
This is my laboratory.”{PAUSE}“All the workings of space
are entered into this
3D Holographic System.”

{Aeris}
“Hey! A shooting star!”

{Tifa}
“Look, look! A shooting star!”

{Cait Sith}
“Whoa! There goes a shootin' star!”

{Barret}
“Whoa! Shootin' stars!”

{Yuffie}
“Wh, what the? A shooting star?”

{Aeris}
“Wow, how wonderful.”

{Tifa}
“Oh! This is amazing!!”

{Cait Sith}
“I'm so overwhelmed!”

{Barret}
“This's really somethin'!”

{Yuffie}
“Whew!!”

Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho Hoooo. Yes, it is something,
isn't it?”{PAUSE}“Well, let's get to
the subject.”

Bugenhagen
“Eventually…all humans die.
What happens to them after they die?”{PAUSE}“The body decomposes, and returns to
the Planet. That much everyone knows.
What about their consciousness,
their hearts and their souls?”

Bugenhagen
“The soul too returns
to the Planet.”

“And not only those of humans, but everything
on this Planet. In fact, all living things
in the universe, are the same.”

“The spirits that return to the Planet,
merge with one another and roam the Planet.”{PAUSE}“They roam, converge, and divide,
becoming a swell, called the 'Lifestream'.”{PAUSE}“Lifestream…
In other words, a path of
energy of the souls roaming the Planet.”

“'Spirit Energy' is a word that
you should never forget.”

“A new life…children are
blessed with Spirit Energy and
are brought into the world.”{PAUSE}“Then, the time comes when they die
and once again return to the Planet…”

“Of course there are exceptions,
but this is the way of the world.”{PAUSE}“I've digressed, but you'll
understand better if you watch this.”

Spirit energy is the source of life for
trees, birds, and humans.

And not only living things.
It makes it possible
to form Planets.

And if that Spirit Energy
were to disappear…
“It would be the end of life as we know it.”

Bugenhagen
“…These are the basics
of the Study of Planet Life.”

{Cloud}
“If Spirit Energy disappears,
our Planet will die.”

Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho Hoooo.
Spirit Energy is efficient BECAUSE it exists
within nature.”{PAUSE}“When Spirit Energy is forcefully extracted,
and manufactured, it can't accomplish
its true purpose.”

{Cloud}
“You're talking about Mako energy, right?”

Bugenhagen
“Everyday Mako reactors suck up
Spirit Energy, diminishing it.”{PAUSE}“Spirit Energy is compressed in reactors
and processed into Mako energy. All living
things are being used up and thrown away.”{PAUSE}“In other words, Mako energy
will only destroy the Planet…”
